com.mapquest.android.maps
Class OverlayItem

java.lang.Object
  com.mapquest.android.maps.OverlayItem

public class OverlayItem
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents an item added to the map as part of an ItemizedOverlay. The item can provide its own Drawable marker, or use the default one for the overlay instance.
